overview: A silent romantic adventure melodrama (from the play and novel by Richard Harding) about a womanizer who follows a beautiful Hispanic woman to her home country and his adventures there.  He ends up helping her father become dictator of the entire country, and is rewarded with marriage to her and he is named Minister of Finance!
tagline: Fights and thrills and gay romance in a Spanish banana republic- with a wild young American and a pretty senorita the center of it all.
title: The Dictator
